title: Bounding norms of elements
description: With this approach, we will try to improve the upper bounds on the norm ${\| g\|}$ of a given non-trivial group element  ${g}$  to the point where this norm must in fact vanish, which would demonstrate that no metric with the above properties on  ${F_2}$  would exist (and in fact would impose strong constraints on similar metrics existing on other groups as well).
